info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 12:59AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD...EASTERN BERGEN...WESTCHESTER...PUTNAM...BRONX...ROCKLAND AND NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM EDT... At 1259 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pomona to Harlem. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, Stamford, Norwalk, Danbury, New Rochelle, White Plains, Mott Haven, East Tremont, New City, Port Chester, Bergenfield, Ossining, Peekskill, New Canaan, and Monsey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
